Title: Pilot
Plot: Susan and Bruce Miller move their family to a wealthy Chicago community as America celebrates its bicentennial. As neighbors welcome them to the neighborhood, the Millers soon discover that there is a sexual revolution going on and the question is, do they join in or keep to themselves.
ParentalRatingReason: M Sex scenes,offensive language and drug use
GuestStars: Steve Shearer, Damon Carney, Nicole Swahn, Jason Singer, Angie Bolling, Morgan Farris
